title: Bowl, ca. 1810–30
provenance: Delomonsne and Son, Ltd., London; 1965 Phelps Warren NY
description: Round body on short foot, 2 fan-shaped handles extending up from scalloped lip; body cut with design of vertical sections each with an oval panel of small diamonds, thin vertical fluting sections around lip, rayed flutes on handles; cutting very sharp.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bowl, ca. 1810–30.
ca. 1810–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-168.
